verses.name: Psalms 107:30
verses.text: Then are they glad because they be quiet; so he bringeth them unto their desired haven.

verses.name: Psalms 107:31
verses.text: Oh that men would praise the Lord for his goodness, and for his wonderful works to the children of men!

verses.name: Psalms 107:32
verses.text: Let them exalt him also in the congregation of the people, and praise him in the assembly of the elders.

verses.name: Psalms 107:33
verses.text: He turneth rivers into a wilderness, and the watersprings into dry ground;

verses.name: Psalms 107:34
verses.text: A fruitful land into barrenness, for the wickedness of them that dwell therein.

verses.name: Psalms 107:35
verses.text: He turneth the wilderness into a standing water, and dry ground into watersprings.
